CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}增加HP、SP 恢復能力。
Effect: HP恢復增加100{nl}SP恢復增加100{nl}冷卻時間減少5秒
Name: 增加HP、SP恢復力
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [刺擊]{/}{/}{nl}用武器底部強力刺擊敵人並擊退。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman2\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 突刺

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}增加自身的攻擊威力。
Effect: 追加傷害 +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}攻擊次數 #{CaptionRatio}#次{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var statBonus = 0;", "var byAbilRate = 0;", "statBonus = Math.floor((pc.STR * 0.1 + pc.DEX * 0.2) * skill.Level)", "var Swordman14_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman14\")", "", "if (Swordman14_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    byAbilRate = Swordman14_abil.Level * 0.01;", "}", "", "value = 5 + (skill.Level - 1) * 1.5 + statBonus;", "value = value + (value * byAbilRate);", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Name: 專注
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}就算受到一時性的傷害，身體也不會僵硬，也不會被擠出或是跌倒，而且狀態異常相關的效果扺抗機率也會增加。
Effect: 持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Swordman29')", "var value = 14 + skill.Level * 1", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + 5", "}", "", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}降低自身的最大 HP，但所攻擊的敵人會有機率發生昏厥。
Effect: 敵人昏厥機率 #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}最大體力 #{CaptionRatio2}# 減少{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 50 + (skill.Level * 5) + (pc.MHP * 0.01 * skill.Level)", "var Swordman24_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman24\")", "", "if (Swordman24_abil != null) {", "    value = value * 1.44", "}", "", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman15\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 10", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}用刀的刀柄打擊敵人。{nl}對昏厥狀態的敵人給予追加傷害，對小型、中型怪物無法部份防禦。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}無視中小型對象防禦力 #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman25\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}利用盾牌的凸起處攻擊敵人，對格擋僵直中的敵人給予的追加傷害。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力會額外套用盾牌的物理防禦力 30%，挑撥數值套用50倍。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}敲打盾牌，挑撥周圍的敵人追蹤自己。被挑撥的怪物移動速度會變快，在30秒內呈現挑撥技能免疫的狀態。
Effect: 套用對象數量 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}挑撥持續時間  #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}#{CaptionRatio2}#秒內最大挑撥對象數增加#{CaptionRatio3}#。
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var buffTime = 5;", "", "if (pc != null) {", "    var abilPeltasta32 = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta32\");", "", "    if (abilPeltasta32 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilPeltasta32, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "        buffTime = buffTime + TryGetProp(abilPeltasta32, \"Level\");", "    }", "", "}", "", "return buffTime;"]
Name: 敲盾挑釁
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}減少自身攻擊力，使防禦力增加。無法和技能奮起一起使用。
Effect: 物理防禦力 #{CaptionRatio}#% 增加{nl}物理攻擊力 #{CaptionRatio2}#% 減少{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 100", "var abilPeltasta34 = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta34\")", "", "if (abilPeltasta34 != null  &&  abilPeltasta34.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = 200", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = skill.Level * 1", "var Peltasta19_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta19\")", "var Peltasta20_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta20\")", "", "if (Peltasta20_abil != null) {", "    value = value * 1.44", "} else if (Peltasta20_abil == null  &&  Peltasta19_abil != null) {", "    value = value * 1.38", "}", "", "var Peltasta13_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta13\")", "", "if (Peltasta13_abil != null) {", "    value = value + Peltasta13_abil.Level * 1.26;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Name: 守護者
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}丟擲盾牌攻擊敵人。丟擲出去的盾牌會掉落在指定的位置上， 自己的物理防禦力也會因丟擲出盾牌而減少裝備的數值，盾牌可以透過角色前往剪取，或是在經過一定時間後自動回收，當盾牌回到身上時，減少的物理防禦力會再次恢復。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力會額外套用盾牌的物理防禦力 30%，挑撥數值套用50倍。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var Peltasta4_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Peltasta4')", "", "if (Peltasta4_abil != null  &&  1 == Peltasta4_abil.ActiveState) {", "    return pc.SR + skill.SklSR + Peltasta4_abil.Level;", "}", "", "return pc.SR + skill.SklSR"]
Name: 盾牌投擲
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}將盾牌擋在前面轉換為積極的防禦姿勢。雖然檔格會增加，但是攻擊力和暴擊發生會減少。
Effect: 格擋增加#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}攻擊力減少#{CaptionTime}#%{nl}暴擊率減少#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}持續時間30秒

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Name: 車輪斬
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}凝聚力量以武器劈擊地面攻擊敵人。對被打倒的敵人造成的傷害增加2倍。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 4次{nl}施展時間 #{CaptionRatio2}#秒{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 蓄力一擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}強力劈擊敵人的頭部進行攻擊。暫時敵人的智能和精神力。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}{#339999}{ol}[衝擊]{/}{/} 持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 擊頭
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}使用武器採取防禦姿勢。遭到防禦後的敵人會對刺擊攻擊呈脆弱狀態。

Name: 十字斬擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [砍擊]{/}{/}{nl}進行將高舉的劍順著身體重心的方向垂直劈下的攻擊。對受到骷髏搖擺的影響而防禦力減少的中型、大型敵人，會按照削減防禦力數值的比例給予追加傷害。額外傷害紅利會根據套用在敵人身上的負面效果數量做套用。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander31\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 垂直斬

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [刺擊]{/}{/}{nl}用槍連續刺擊敵人給予傷害。 連續刺擊越多，對敵人造成的傷害會增加。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 15次{nl}廣域攻擊比率#{SkillSR}#{nl}傷害最多增加100%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Hoplite11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}轉換為積極攻擊的鬥牛姿勢狀態。增加暴擊率、格擋，但迴避會減少。
Effect: 暴擊發生增加 #{CaptionRatio}# {nl}格擋增加 #{CaptionRatio3}# {nl}迴避減少 #{CaptionRatio2}# {nl} 持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 15 * skill.Level", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Hoplite9');", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * 2;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 瞄準隙缝
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Name: 長矛投擲
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [刺擊]{/}{/}{nl}刺擊前方的敵人給予傷害，並造成對刺擊攻擊的脆弱狀態。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間6秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Hoplite26\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 長矛刺擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [刺擊]{/}{/}{nl}強力刺擊敵人之後，再用腳踢開。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian17\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 開腸剖肚
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}在跳躍中或是在空中時，對下面的敵人強力踩踏給予傷害。攻擊力會隨著角色的高度、鞋子防具的防禦能力而增加。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian20\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 踐踏
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}暫時讓周邊敵人的防禦率減少，按照周邊對象數量攻擊力成正比增加。
Effect: 最用對象 #{CaptionRatio}#名{nl} 物 理防禦力最多 #{CaptionRatio2}#% 減少{nl}每個套用對象數量物理攻擊力 #{CaptionRatio3}#提升{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var Warcry_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Barbarian1')", "var value = 5;", "", "if (Warcry_abil != null  &&  1 == Warcry_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = 5 + Warcry_abil.Level;", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionRatio3: ["var Warcry_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian11\")", "var value = skill.Level * 4", "", "if (Warcry_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * (1 + Warcry_abil.Level * 0.01)", "}", "", "value = Math.floor(value)", "return value"]
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 30", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 2", "}", "", "return value;"]

Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["", "if (null != pc) {", "    var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Barbarian22');", "", "    if (null != abil  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "        return skill.Level", "    }", "", "}", "", "return skill.Level * 2"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}抓住敵人利用離心力，使勁拋甩出去。被攻擊的敵人命中減少。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}迴轉次數9圈{nl}投擲距離150
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "} else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}連續攻擊敵人上方，讓敵人陷於昏厥狀態。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 2次{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian25\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 破顱斬
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬擊]{/}{/}{nl}以動搖大地的攻擊，讓敵人的攻擊停止。敵人會以一定機率陷入昏厥狀態。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio2}#次{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian26\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 地裂斬
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬擊]{/}{/}{nl}轉動身體，利用離心力強力攻擊敵人。擊中的話暴擊發生率增加，對陷入昏厥狀態的敵人增加傷害。且受到攻擊的敵人會有一段時間對斬擊屬性攻擊的傷害增加。

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}以盾牌防礙敵人的行動。{nl}對象會陷入失衡狀態。{nl}陷入失衡狀態的敵人被攻擊時，會以一定機率被擊倒。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力會額外套用盾牌的物理防禦力30%。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}防禦力 #{CaptionRatio}#% 減少{nl}{#339999}{ol}[失衡]{/}{/} 持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 5;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Rodelero25')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level;", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rodelero20\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 盾牌推擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬擊]{/}{/}{nl}按住按鍵時，會壓低姿勢向前方前進。提高對敵攻擊的迴避和格擋，抵抗狀態異常的機率增加，同時在移動結束後攻擊敵人。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力會額外套用盾牌的物理防禦力 30%。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}最大持續時間10秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rodelero24\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 迴避移動
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}使用刀和盾牌對敵人進行連續攻擊。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力會額外套用盾牌的物理防禦力100%。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 4次{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}在野外上設置為了組隊成員的基地營地。組隊成員們在營地上可以使用個人倉庫及瞬間移動。在營地周圍使用的BUFF，其持續時間會增加。
Effect: 持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#小時{nl}飲食效果持續時間30分鐘以上
Name: 設置營地

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬擊]{/}{/}{nl}向前方對像進行無差別斬擊。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 3次{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Squire11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 死亡連擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}開設整修武器和防具，以及暫時提升裝備能力的商店。防具中只有上衣、褲子、盾牌可以整修，在地下城地區開設時價格會增加。
Effect: 增加[技能等級]+[裝備的配戴等級]*[裝備的等級]{nl}程度的攻擊力{nl}攻擊 #{CaptionRatio}# 次數{nl}增加[技能等級]+[裝備的配戴等級]*[裝備的等級]程度的防禦力{nl}被攻擊 #{CaptionRatio2}# 次數{nl}持續時間1小時
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 2500 + skill.Level * 250 + pc.INT", "var Squire3 = GetAbility(pc, 'Squire3');", "", "if (Squire3 != null  &&  1 == Squire3.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value + Squire3.Level * 20", "}", "", "return value"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 500 + skill.Level * 50 + pc.INT", "var Squire4 = GetAbility(pc, 'Squire4');", "", "if (Squire4 != null  &&  1 == Squire4.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value + Squire4.Level * 5", "}", "", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}插上提高海盜團戰鬥能力的海賊旗。在海賊旗周圍連續消滅敵人時，會發動連擊技能。當連擊達到300次時，會發動增加飛彈攻擊傷害的狂熱BUFF。連擊只有在插上海賊旗之後發動1次，而且必須為組隊狀態。

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}以技能鐵鉤拖拉補獲的敵人。敵人每次拖拉時會受到傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio}#次
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 龍骨拖引
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}可以暫時快速連接基本攻擊和短劍攻擊。
Effect: 在基本攻擊的動作後，{nl}可以無延遲使用短劍{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#分{nl}追加傷害 #{CaptionRatio}#%
Name: 雙手猛攻
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}一面迴轉，一面以握持在雙手上的武器，對敵人進行連打攻擊。受到攻擊的敵人會暫時被限制行動。如被攻擊擊中，物理攻擊力套用 80% + 輔助物理攻擊力套用 60％。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 3次
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: 方陣
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Effect: 追加防禦力增加#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}每2秒消耗SP1%

Effect: 對部隊成員傳達攻擊力#{CaptionRatio2}#% {nl}攻擊時，#{CaptionRatio}#連打{nl}每2秒消耗SP 1%
Name: 楔形陣
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Name: 英勇行動
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = null", "    var bunsinCount = null", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "        bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "        bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    } else {", "        var handle = session.GetMyHandle();", "        bunshinBuff = info.GetBuff(handle, 3049)", "        bunsinCount = bunshinBuff.arg1", "    }", "", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}將劍反握以手柄部位敲擊敵人。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Doppelsoeldner12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var skillSR = skill.SklSR;", "var abil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Doppelsoeldner24')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    skillSR = skillSR + abil.Level;", "}", "", "var value = pc.SR + skillSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "", "return value"]
Name: 擊殺
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}在定好的攻擊次數內消滅敵人，會獲得2倍的經驗值和獎勵，但是在效果持續時，獲得的傷害會變成3倍，不能戰鬥時，耐久度減少量也會大幅增加。
Effect: 攻擊限制 #{CaptionRatio}#次{nl}經驗值2倍、掉落率2倍
Name: 雙酬
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav.
