Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (basicSP * abilAddSP)", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}寵物在對象周圍游走，當作標的。對象迴避和命中減少。
Effect: 迴避減少#{CaptionRatio}# {nl}命中減少#{CaptionRatio}# {nl}標記 AI 持續時間90秒

SP: ["var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var basicSP = skill.BasicSP + lvUpSpendSp * (lv - 1);", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]{/}{/}{nl}寵物將敵人咬住拖向主人。敵人陷入無法攻擊狀態並持續受到傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}最大持續時間5秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Hunter12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}受攻擊的對象 {#339999}{ol}[恐怖]{/}{/}+{#339999}{ol}[混亂]{/}{/}{nl}對周邊最多 #{CaptionRatio}#名 {#339999}{ol}[恐怖]{/}{/}{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 5;", "var Scout6_abil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Scout6')", "", "if (Scout6_abil != null  &&  1 == Scout6_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + (Scout6_abil.Level * 1)", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Scout11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: 每5秒SP消耗 #{CaptionRatio}# {nl}懸停、音速突擊傷害增加 #{CaptionRatio2}#%
Name: 主動攻擊
SP: ["var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var basicSP = skill.BasicSP + lvUpSpendSp * (lv - 1);", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[飛彈：大砲]{/}{/}{nl}在前方架設砲台。把架設的砲台和自己持有的大砲組合起來，對前方大範圍的敵人造成傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cannoneer15\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var skillSR = skill.SklSR;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Bazooka_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    skillSR = Math.floor(skillSR * 2);", "}", "", "var value = pc.SR + skillSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "", "return value"]
Name: 大砲轟炸
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[飛彈：槍]{/}{/}{nl}對指定的地區周圍進行掃射，攻擊多數的敵人們。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 11次

Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "} else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/}{nl}快速突進前方，攻擊遇上的敵人後再回到原位。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 2次{nl}被攻擊對象數 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}可在騎乘狀態下使用
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Hackapell13\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 無窮襲擊
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var hakkaPalleSkill = GetSkill(pc, \"Hackapell_HakkaPalle\")", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'HakkaPalle_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.Job == 'Hackapell') {", "    value = value - (value * (hakkaPalleSkill.Level * 0.05))", "}", "", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[飛彈：弓]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}一次發出五隻箭，使該範圍內的敵人受到傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 5次
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Mergen2\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 多方射擊
SP: ["var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var basicSP = skill.BasicSP + lvUpSpendSp * (lv - 1);", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (basicSP * abilAddSP)", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}使自身和附近隊員的盾牌和輔助武器的強化數值增加至技能等級水準。
Effect: 強化數值 #{CaptionRatio}#增加{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionRatio2}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Appraiser1')", "var time = 40", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    time = time + (abil.Level * 1)", "}", "", "return time;"]
Name: 高估

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}鑑定師自己展示裝備的飾品的仿造品。鑑定師本身除外的隊員們可以利用展示的仿造品。利用防造品時會套用仿造品的效果。
Effect: 防造品table持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}Buff持續時間 #{CaptionRatio2}#秒

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}以一定機率讓前方敵人角色裝備的強化數值和超越數值變成0。當敵人為怪物時，物理、魔魔攻擊力和物理、魔法防禦力會減少。當敵人為Boss怪物時，減少一半數值。
Effect: 低估機率 #{CaptionTime}#%{nl}套用對象 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}怪物物理、魔法攻擊力減少 #{CaptionRatio2}#% {nl}怪物物理、魔法防禦力減少 #{CaptionRatio3}#% {nl}怪物對象持續時間120秒{nl}角色對象持續時間 20秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Appraiser2\")", "var ratio = 50", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    ratio = ratio + (abil.Level * 1)", "}", "", "return ratio"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[飛彈：弓]{/}{/}{nl}利用放大鏡尋找敵人弱點進行攻擊。此攻擊無條件以暴擊命中，以被攻擊的敵人為基準一定範圍內的對象被暴擊擊中的機率會增加。{nl}(弱點攻擊的效果和角色的暴擊發生分別套用。)
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}最小暴擊率增加{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Appraiser4\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 弱點攻擊

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[飛彈：槍]{/}{/}{nl}移動並朝目標敵人和周圍敵人亂射，基本攻擊套用為2連打，傷害和攻擊速度增加。[雙槍姿態]的基本攻擊攻擊力加上追加攻擊力，不套用[奔跑射擊]的追加攻擊力和連打，技能使用中，只能使用基本攻擊。
Effect: 基本攻攻擊追加攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間 10秒{nl}周圍敵人最多5名{nl}轉換為雙槍姿態後才能使用
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Bulletmarker11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: 世界樹之歌
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}以一定機率自身學習的吹手技能中隨機發動1種，就算吹奏失數，技能還是會發動，但是各技能的效果會降低。發動的技能不會受到各技能冷卻時間的影響。
Effect: 發動技能{nl}* 不和諧音{nl}：失敗時持續時間減半{nl}* 搖籃曲{nl}：失敗時半夢半醒命中效果減半{nl}* 行軍曲{nl}：失敗時持續時間減半{nl}* 世界樹之歌{nl}：失敗時持續時間減半
Name: 即興演奏
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}產生恢復HP或是給予敵人傷害的魔法陣。飄浮對象不被套用。HP恢復量會按照最大HP比例。按照施展者的智力和能力值增加恢復。
Name: 治癒
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}解除同伴的1等級狀態異常或是產生給予敵人傷害的魔法陣。漂浮的對象不會被套用。
Effect: #{CaptionRatio3}#每秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}攻擊次數 #{CaptionRatio}#次{nl}魔法陣持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio3: ["var value = 0.4;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric1\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = 0.2;", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: 防禦#{CaptionRatio}#次{nl}魔法陣持續時間20秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = skill.Level * 2;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Cleric18')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 1;", "}", "", "return value;"]

Effect: 每疊減少0.3%{nl}魔法陣持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var buffTime = skill.Level * 2 + 4;", "var Cleric5_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric5\");", "", "if (Cleric5_abil != null  &&  1 == Cleric5_abil.ActiveState) {", "    buffTime = buffTime + Cleric5_abil.Level;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(buffTime);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}召喚神聖的火炬，持續恢復周圍同伴的HP並減少周圍敵人的命中。接近火炬時減益效果的持續時間減少。
Name: 聖火
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}產生提升同伴們的暴擊力或下降敵人的暴擊力的魔法陣。
Effect: 我軍暴擊攻擊力 #{CaptionRatio}# 增加{nl}敵暴擊抵抗 #{CaptionRatio2}# 減少
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var statbonus = pc.MNA * (skill.Level * 0.1)", "var value = 12 + (6 * skill.Level) + statbonus", "var Kriwi17_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Kriwi17\")", "", "if (Kriwi17_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * (1 + Kriwi17_abil.Level * 0.01);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 暴擊魔法陣
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Kriwi11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}雕刻夜星女神瓦卡麗涅神像。透過女神像可以傳送到其它地區。
Name: 瓦卡麗涅女神像
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [刺擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}以雕刻刀攻擊對象。對植物型怪物可套用追加傷害，並可以獲得雕像材料。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 5次{nl}植物型怪物追加傷害 +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}雕像材料掉落機率 #{CaptionTime}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 1
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = skill.Level * 5", "var Dievdirbys1_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Dievdirbys1');", "", "if (Dievdirbys1_abil != null  &&  1 == Dievdirbys1_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + Dievdirbys1_abil.Level", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Dievdirbys11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}建立將周圍的敵人們推到外面，讓其暫時無法進來的保護壁。在壁牆內的我軍，魔法防禦力會提升。
Name: 障壁
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}以對叛教者下的審判攻擊敵人。被攻擊的敵人對火、冰、電氣、地、毒等屬性的抵抗力減少。且對陷入昏厥狀態的敵人給予增加傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 2次{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#{nl}各屬性抵抗力 #{CaptionRatio2}# 減少
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Paladin17\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}增加範圍內我軍的物理防禦力和魔法防禦力。並依增加的防禦力造成聖屬性追加傷害。
Effect: 物理防禦力增加#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}魔法防禦力增加#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}持續時間10秒{nl}消耗#{SpendItemCount}#個聖水{nl}每秒消耗SP #{CaptionRatio3}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var DEF = pc.DEF", "var defRate = DEF * (0.1 * skill.Level)", "return Math.floor(defRate)"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var MDEF = pc.MDEF;", "var mdefRate = MDEF * (0.1 * skill.Level)", "return Math.floor(mdefRate)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}以鍛鍊的手指尖強力攻擊敵人內部，造成內傷。依照敵人的防禦力比例造成追加傷害。(追加傷害不會超過角色的最大攻擊力。)
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Monk15\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 鐵砂掌
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}用手刀強力劈擊對象給予傷害。依照敵人的精神比例，造成追加傷害。(追加傷害不會超過角色的最大攻擊力。)
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#

Name: 彈指神功
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown - (skill.Level * 1000);", "", "if (basicCoolDown < 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 10000;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(basicCoolDown);"]

Name: 寬恕
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}強行延長套用在敵人身上的減益效果持續時間。DeBuff的持續時間只能延長一次。
Effect: Debuff剩餘時間的 #{CaptionRatio}#% 程度增加
Name: 辨別邪惡

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic]{/}{/}{nl}開設代購同伴們的道具，獲得捐贈的奉獻箱。只能設置在女神像周圍。不可設置在村莊內部。
Effect: 最大購買數量#{CaptionRatio}#
Name: 奉獻
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Effect: 可登錄消耗道具的技能{nl}追加持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#%
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 100 + (skill.Level * 80);", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Pardoner4\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + (abil.Level * 40);", "}", "", "return value"]

Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Pardoner7\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: 命運扭轉
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 20000;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(basicCoolDown);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}設置暫時賦予超再生能力的魔法陣，踏入這個魔法陣的自己或是同伴就算受到傷害也可以立刻恢復到踏入魔法陣當下的體力，恢復量會受到施展者治癒力的影響，恢復量不會超過自身最大HP的10%。(在PVP伺服器Buff的持續時間會變更為20秒。)
Effect: 持續時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}HP恢復#{CaptionRatio}#
Name: 再生因子
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [火]{/}{/}{nl}燃燒被施予狀態異常的敵人。按照敵人們所擁有的狀態異常數量的比例，火焰狀態的持續時間會延長。
Effect: 每0.4秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}基本持續時間 #{CaptionRatio2}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"PlagueDoctor2\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 焚燒

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}讓自己或同伴的血流動，暫時不被施予狀態異常。這狀態下，2階以下的異常狀態全部都會無效化。
Effect: 持續時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}HP減少#{CaptionRatio}#

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}賦予自己和組隊成員免疫震退、擊倒及施展不被打斷的效果。敵人造成的傷害增加20%。
Effect: 持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: 美沙酮
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}使用女神的權能，成為對攻擊自己的敵人7倍奉進行報仇的狀態。

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}利用卡巴拉魔法召喚地面的蛇攻擊敵人。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}對象數 10{nl}持續時間 8秒{nl}套用對象數 10
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1);", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Kabbalist3\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}對指定怪物使用數秘術，進行複製。被複製的怪物消滅後是無法獲得經驗值的，但可以獲得掉落的道具。已複製過的怪物無法再進行複製。
Effect: 複製怪物持續時間 [產出數量] + #{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: 複製
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}以數祕術算出的數字為基準，對自身周圍的敵人發動權能輪。在權能輪狀態下，被攻擊的敵人將比照權能輪的數量遭受傷害，依算出的數字套用傷害。
Effect: 持續時間30秒{nl} 傷害增加量#{CaptionRatio}#%
Name: 權能輪
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}設置賽菲羅斯之樹圖案的地板，減少我軍的被攻擊傷害，同時周期性使體力恢復。
Effect: 持續時間 10秒{nl} 傷害減少50%{nl}每0.4秒恢復最大體力 #{CaptionRatio}#% {nl}消耗10個聖水
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = skill.Level;", "var abilKabbalist25 = GetAbility(pc, \"Kabbalist25\");", "", "if (abilKabbalist25 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilKabbalist25, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "    value = value + abilKabbalist25.Level * 0.3", "}", "", "return value;"]
Name: 生命之樹

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}讓組隊成員的攻擊變成帶有神聖屬性的狀態。神聖屬性追加攻擊和施展者的聖禮等級成正比，當體力掉到40%以下時效果會增加。
Effect: 持續時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}消耗基瑟洛堤斯藥草1個
Name: 終傅聖事

Effect: 祈禱所持續時間#{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}效果持續時間#{CaptionRatio2}#秒{nl}消耗披風1個

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}將前方驅魔魔法陣變成巨大的驅魔光柱。這神聖的光柱能持續給予對方傷害。
Effect: 每0.5秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Chaplain3\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 十字驅魔

Effect: 持續時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}消耗1個聖水

Name: 絕望號
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [砍擊]{/}{/}{nl}召喚輪子，給予周圍敵人傷害。在輪子附近使用魔法的敵人就算脫離輪子的攻擊範圍也會受到傷害。
Effect: 每0.3秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}需要2個拷問道具
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 10;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor20\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + abil.Level", "}", "", "return value"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor13\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 破碎之輪
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打擊]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻擊速度]{/}{/}{nl}高舉武器過頭，重力向下揮擊，使用鈍器或是雙手鈍器時，會造成追加傷害，無視部份敵人的防禦力。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}廣域攻擊比率 #{SkillSR}#{nl}無視敵人防禦力50%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor10\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 神之粉碎
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}釋放魔導書的力量給予敵人傷害，被攻擊的敵人的智慧與精神減半，每當被攻擊時，造成和自身魔法攻擊力成正比的追加傷害，使用魔法攻擊時消耗SP為兩倍。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 7次{nl}被攻擊者魔法攻擊力的#{CaptionRatio}#%追加傷害{nl}持續時間 10秒{nl}最多套用7名
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [砍擊]{/}{/}{nl}召喚巨大剪刀，連續攻擊前方的敵人，使用技能時，就算被敵人擊中，技能也不會取消，給予惡魔型敵人的傷害增加。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}對象數 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}需要2個拷問道具
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 5", "var STR = pc.STR", "var strValue = STR / 50", "", "if (strValue <= 0) {", "    strValue = 0", "}", "", "value = value + strValue", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}設置可以隱藏自己行蹤的符咒。在符咒周圍的同伴不會遭受到怪物的威脅。
Effect: 爆炸攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}符咒維持時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}效果套用範圍 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}需要2個槐黃紙
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "} else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]

Name: 呼風喚雨符
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}呼風喚雨符可讓呼風喚雨符、隱形符、三災符、破死符立即爆破給予敵人傷害。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Daoshi9\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 急急如律令
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}設置具有火、冰、電氣 屬性特性的符咒。符咒周圍的同伴會增加冰、電氣屬性抵抗力。符咒爆發時被擊中的敵人會受到火、冰、電氣3種屬性傷害。
Effect: 爆炸攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 3次{nl}符咒維持時間 #{CaptionTime}#分{nl}火、冰、電氣屬性扺抗力 #{CaptionRatio}# 增加{nl}需要2個黃符紙
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "} else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]
Name: 三災符

Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio}#次{nl}爆發攻擊力 #{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}需要黃符紙3個

Effect: 最大清掃維持時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}魔法陣 持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#秒
Name: 清掃
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}手持弓箭丟擲至指定位置。給以惡魔型敵人很大的傷害，在弓箭掉落位置的周邊暫時給予神聖傷害。
Effect: 每0.3秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}最大攻擊對象10名{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionRatio2}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Miko3\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 破魔矢
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]

Effect: 最大持續時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}每1秒SP消耗量 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}神聖屬性追加傷害 #{CaptionRatio2}#%
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 70 + skill.Level * 2", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Miko5\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value * 1.1", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
