Name: 狂熱幻覺
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}消耗自身剩餘SP的50%，在持續時間內進行神聖屬性追加攻擊
Effect: 持續時間40秒{nl}消耗的SP x #{CaptionRatio}#等量追加攻擊{nl}可攻擊次數40次

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}被周圍的敵人攻擊時，賦予給予神聖屬性傷害的debuff。
Effect: 攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間  #{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}可攻擊次數10次{nl}套用對象數10
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Zealot11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}透過閱讀蘊藏女神力量的指示文造成敵人聖屬性魔法傷害，陷入移動速度減少狀態，對惡魔型敵人追加打擊，強化移動速度減少效果。

Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 5;", "var abilExorcist2 = GetAbility(pc, \"Exorcist2\");", "", "if (abilExorcist2 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilExorcist2, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "    value = value + abilExorcist2.Level;", "}", "", "return value;"]

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(owner) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.8;", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [神聖]{/}{/}{nl}凝聚組隊成員的信仰合而為一，發揮制裁惡魔的神聖力量。周圍有3名以上的角色存在時才能使用，若有3名以聖職者角色存在，會觸發追加傷害。
Effect: 每0.4秒攻擊力 #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持續時間 #{CaptionRatio}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Exorcist16\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
